13 return new_thread(task, nullptr);

15
16thread_t* cydui::threading::new_thread(
17 void(task)(thread_t* this_thread), void* data
18) {
19 auto* arg = new thread_t();
20 arg->running = true;
21 arg->data = data;
22 auto* thread = new std::thread(task, arg);
23 arg->native_thread = thread;
24 return arg;
25}

27
28thread_t* cydui::threading::thread_t::set_name(const str &name) {
29 pthread_t pt = ((std::thread*) native_thread)->native_handle();
30 pthread_setname_np(pt, name.c_str());
31 return this;
32}

34void cydui::threading::thread_t::join() const {
35 ((std::thread*) native_thread)->join();
36}
